```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(moranajp)
```

```{r }
bin_dir <- "d:/pf/mecab/bin/" # input your environment
fileEncoding <- "CP932"    # input your environment

data(neko)
neko <- 
  neko %>%
  dplyr::mutate(text=stringi::stri_unescape_unicode(text)) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(cols=1:nrow(.))

mecab_all(neko, 
          text_col="text", 
          bin_dir=bin_dir, 
          fileEncoding=fileEncoding) %>%
  print(n=100)
```
